title: Bug 18705 - Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example application exhibits excessive flashing.
OB: When running the Control Example application and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The Control Example application should not exhibit excessive flashing when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the Control Example application. 
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 
3. Observe the flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
